'''Radiant Spincrystal 48''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Streets of Elegance]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of some boxes in front of the [[Statue of the Omnipresent God]].
